column4: hello hackers, i m using thinkpad r 61, since today morning i unable to login in my ubuntu 10.04, after log in screen after entering password it shows black screen and again back to log in promt
plz help
press ctrl-alt-f1, login and checkout /var/log, there might be information you are looking for
~/.xsession-errors is empthy?
where can i check logs
from console
m in console
read the file i asked
its saying following mess "34: cant open /home/prathamesh/.profile"
its saying following mess "34: cant open /home/prathamesh/.profile
what does ls -ltrha /home/prathamesh/.profile say?
o/p of command as follow "-rw-r--r-- 1 prathamesh prathamesh 675 2010-08-01 02:34 /home/prathamesh/.profile"
ok, and you are trying to login as user prathamesh ?
try to run sudo chown prathamesh -R /home/prathamesh
and then login again
nope man same problem
have you tried to create another user, login and see is the same error?
k will do that

Dr_Willis: i tried new user by saying "useradd new" and then set passwd by saying "passwd new" and then restart and re login with new user but it also shows me purple color screen no dektop only mouse pointer
hmmh. have you done any updates, installed anything, or something before this happened at first time?
this is 1st time i update my machine regularly but before last log out i uninstall evolution and clamv antivirus and all files of both apps
sudo adduser
to your home-folder
Dr_Willis: i tried wat u said. created .xsession file in my main user and again try to log in but nthing happening problem remains unresolved
